description:
A tough-fighting Gynoid and companion of Dr. Chaos, created from the image of Dr. Chaos`s lover in his younger days. She is strong, fast and resistant to damage, hiding all kind of weapons in her body, and is yet a kind-hearted "person" who possesses a soul and the urge to serve mankind, unlike her sister Teresa. Maria acts as Dr. Chaos` main weapon, bodyguard and housekeeper.
Source: Wiki
name: Maria
